resources.string: We need your authorization to send links to your Google account.
There was an error with Google credentials. Please authorize PhoneToDesktop again.
Could not access server. Try again later.
PhoneToDesktop sends links and text from your Android device to your desktop computer
From any application which shares text, choose “share” option.
A list of applications which can receive text will be shown. Choose PhoneToDesktop.
You will see a notification while PhoneToDesktop sends the text. When the text is successfully sent, the notification goes away.
To see your sent texts in your desktop or notebook, choose Tasks in Gmail.
You can see the list of sent texts under the "PhoneToDesktop" list.
PhoneToDesktop is free software (as in freedom). The source code is in https://code.google.com/p/phone-to-desktop/ (touch and hold to share this link).
